title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 505 - Coastal Erosion Management
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 505 - Coastal Erosion Management

State Regulations

Introduction (§ 505.1 to 505.3)

Department Regulation of Coastal Erosion Hazard Areas (§ 505.4 to 505.15)

Local Regulation of Coastal Erosion Hazard Areas (§ 505.16 to 505.20)

Amendments to Coastal Erosion Hazard Area Maps (§ 505.21 to 505.22)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 505

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§3-0301, 34-0108

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
